name: capsulecrm-mcp
description: Connect Claude to your CapsuleCRM account for natural language customer and sales management
long_description: Transform your CRM workflow with AI! This MCP server connects Claude directly to your CapsuleCRM account, enabling natural language interactions with customer data, sales opportunities, and task management. Ask questions like 'Show me all VIP customers from last month' or 'Create a new opportunity for Acme Corp' and let Claude handle the CRM operations for you.

prompts.name: Customer Insights
prompts.description: Get comprehensive insights about your customers and sales pipeline
prompts.text: Show me all VIP customers from last month and their associated opportunities

prompts.name: Sales Pipeline Review
prompts.description: Review current sales opportunities and their status
prompts.text: What's the total value of our open opportunities? Show me deals closing this quarter

prompts.name: Task Management
prompts.description: Manage and track tasks across your team
prompts.text: What tasks are overdue? Show me all tasks assigned to Sarah

prompts.name: New Opportunity Creation
prompts.description: Create a new sales opportunity with AI assistance
prompts.text: Create a new opportunity for Acme Corp worth $50,000 for our Q1 software project

prompts.name: Customer Search
prompts.text: Find all customers in New York that we haven't contacted in 30 days

prompts.name: Pipeline Analysis
prompts.text: Which opportunities have the highest probability? Show me deals stuck in the proposal stage
